title: Animation Project
content: This Project is the first website that I created with some animations. The idea was inspired by the back photo I took a couple of years ago at Woodbine beach. I wanted the theme to be dreamy to match the background with more bubbles, which was why I decided to use a cannabis store to match it. When you click the "Make some bubbles" button, the bubble will start shooting. And when you hover over the bubble, it will pop. This was created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: E-commerce website
content: This project is my first website building with Node.js. Since I am a coffee lover, I decided to build a coffer E-commerce website. To practice with different frameworks, I used some from bootstrap to help make the website to be well responsive.

title: Passion Tickets
content: My passion tickets is an app that users who love concerts and sports. They can store the tickets they buy from different websites so they can organize their tickets and won't miss a date for their favourite events. This was using C# and ASP.NET framework
